item.title: Trump picks Casey Means for surgeon general, after first nominee withdraws
item.description: Dr. Janette Nesheiwat withdrew her nomination for Surgeon General after questions about her credentials. Dr. Casey Means has a medical degree from Stanford and a best-selling book on metabolic health.

item.title: Energy Star, efficiency program that has steered consumer choice, targeted in cuts
item.description: An Environmental Protection Agency plan to eliminate its Energy Star offices would end a decades-old program that gave consumers a choice to buy environmentally friendly electronics and save money on bills, consumer and environmental groups said.

item.title: Black smoke rises from the Sistine Chapel as cardinals cast an unsuccessful first vote
item.description: Black smoke streamed from the chimney of the Sistine Chapel, signaling that the more than 130 cardinal electors have not come to a two-thirds agreement about who the next pope should be.
